interactions.Alarm:
The user, a young adult male in his early 20s, frequently interacts with the alarm assistant to manage his weekday morning routine. As a university student working part-time, he values the ability to set reliable alarms that help him start his day on time.

Initially, the user requested a recurring alarm for weekdays at 8:30 AM, with an upbeat music track as the alarm sound. He appreciated the assistant's ability to suggest energizing song options from various genres, ultimately settling on a pop-rock tune that gradually increases in volume.

Over time, the user has experimented with different alarm times, occasionally adjusting the weekday alarm to 7:45 AM or 9:00 AM based on his class schedule or work shifts. He has also requested one-off alarms for weekends when he needs to wake up early for specific events or commitments.

The user has provided feedback on the alarm sounds, expressing a preference for dynamic tracks that start softly and build up in intensity, rather than jarring alarms. He has also asked the assistant to suggest alternative alarm sounds periodically, to prevent habituation and ensure the alarms remain effective in waking him up.

In addition to setting alarms, the user has requested features like snooze customization and gentle reminders to go to bed on time, particularly during exam periods or when he has an early commitment the following day. He appreciates the assistant's ability to adapt to his changing needs and preferences, ensuring a seamless and personalized alarm experience.
